title: Fun Pendant Lamp
body: In 1964, Verner Panton saw the world surrounding him as inspiration source of all his designs and his Fun Lamps resonates his excellent love-for-details. Inspired by nature and this design employs natural mother of pearl to great effect. The simple and elegant look makes this the perfect lamp for those who want a classy and unique home. The combination of creativity and functionality in the design of this lamp will make feel and hear the world light. Use it as a prominent and inspiring part of your interior design to bring out the best features of your home.
